product_name: Quiksilver Off The Wall 2 Surf Shirt - Men's
long_description: Featuring a relaxed fit and reliable protection from UV rays, the men's Quiksilver Off The Wall 2 Surf Shirt can help you stay comfortable and extend your great times in the water.
